phrases: She said'Help yourselves' and looks very proud.
You can have the biggest one because you are a big guy Poppo.
She said you get it because you are the biggest one here.
What is mine going to have the most of?
Yours will have the most raisins.
I want you to tell me directly.
Let us see, here is some paper.
Now Menma can show how she feels.
You could write in the diary.
It looks like it still has ink in it.
I feel really sleepy for some reason.
It is like I am too relaxed.
Menma is not angry at us.
We do not know whether she is really forgiven us or not.
I do not think she would have made muffin bread for us if she was angry.
It is also possible that she is appeared in order to condemn us precisely because she has not forgiven us.
If she could write all along, why did not she just do that from the start?
If she did, we could have communicated with her and believed in her existence immediately.
Both Menma and Jintan can be real airheads.
He told us to believe in Menma.
But really he just wanted to keep her for himself.
Hisakawa, Anjou, make sure to save up what you earn from your jobs.
I will definitely make Menma go to heaven.
You ran around in top gear for so long it is no wonder you are tired.
We all want to make fireworks together.
Running around like that is dangerous.
I could not forgive myself for liking you.
That is the way it is.
Could you cover my shift for next week?
On Thursday they are doing construction on the bridge.
The pay is high so I want to be there.
So she is finally gotten tired.
Meiko's mother probably told Yama about it.
So it was her after all.
So you are not the one against the fireworks.
She is still living in the past.
Time has not moved at all for her since what happened to Meiko.
I want to pull her back into the present.
That is why I do not want to force her to remember any more.
I do not want to sound pretentious, but I think I understand how your wife feels.
I want to do something for Meiko.
I was also living in the past, which is all the more reason I...
I was surprised you did something so uncool.
You would do anything for Menma.
If you really believe in Menma, are you okay with making her go to heaven?
You were so obsessed with Menma, and now you can even talk to her through Yadomi.
I will be working late tonight so I thought I would take Menma home first.
She does not want to be locked up inside so she is been following me everywhere.
I want to try my best together with everyone.
She says she wants to be together with everyone.
Actually she is grown like the rest of us.
Who would like an ugly girl like...
You know, so-so, sort of kind of hot... or rather, cute.
It is like a one-man theatre.
But it is not like that.
I will let you make them.
We did it, we did it, we did it!
I cannot let you handle the combustible materials,
but do you want to help out with the simple stuff?
Please let us help out sir.
So this thing comes out of the bamboo shoot right?
I think it would be cute with more red.
I honestly did not think you had that side to you...
And this is where you ignite it.
It makes it easier to carry when you take it to the launch pad.
And this is the same thing.
Do not let go of that Jintan.
She just jumped onto your back.
Even though I cannot see Menma, I can see.
I cannot measure up to her.
I will go buy some juice or something.
I was about to start screaming back there too.
Nor can I talk to her.
I wanted to see her again.
So why is it only Yadomi?
And for Yadomi it is all about Menma.
You were about to say'Jintan' but immediately changed it to'Yadomi'.
What is with you and acting like you can see right through people?
You are the only one I can see through.
Call it empathy between the like-minded.
I do not want to be compared to a freak like you.
I was actually pretty serious about what I said before.
You are really not used to guys are you.
What the hell do you mean'nice kick'?
Alright, I am all fired up.
Anaru's stuffed animals are not here.
Yeah, right out of the blue.
She is a stray little kitten, that one.
Say that Menma really is at your house, if you grant her wish, will not she disappear?
Oh, it is time for work.
She says she wants to stay here.
Stay right up in here yo.
Really be up in here yo.
That is because I am so happy.
The one where the high school girl fights with nun-chucks.
So you have finally watched it?
At first I thought of her as a beast of summer.
I bought the DVD and I heard there was a new one out too...
A girl fights teachers with pom-poms.
But I cannot write on the paper at the house.
Take a hat in one hand and a pie in another, put them together, and you have'happy!'
The number you have dialed is currently...
Why am I walking more quickly?
Menma is probably at the secret base,
so why am I like this?
I do not want Menma to disappear!
I do not want that to happen!
I really, really do not want you to die!
The one who calls others weird is the weirdo.
There is a really big one in the river.
I wanted to see it up close.
It is by those tree roots.
I will catch the carp for you.
We still do not know the name of the flower we saw that day.
kimi to korogasu tsukaisute no jitensha
umi wo miwatasu saka wo kakenobotte
souyatte i am about to wa boku no hou e
mada futari wa sugu soko ni irunoni
kimi to korogasu tsukaisute no jitensha
umi wo miwatasu saka wo kakenobotte
souyatte i am about to wa boku no hou e
mada futari wa sugu soko ni irunoni
Upon pages and pages of entries
We have put down all our emotions
But now I have hit a writer's block
I do not know how to finish this page anymore
Putting a bookmark in my diary
You and I go out to ride the bike we found in the dumpster
Let us go to our secret place
Where we piled up our bricks of memories
Run up the hill, where we can see the horizon
Where we can see the sky so fearfully blue
With cider in my right hand
My other hand helps me search for you
You used to come find me way back when
You used to demand me of so much more
You are both still standing right by my side
Yet why do I pray to see you both again?
There must be something off with me

jyuunen no ato hachigatsu mata deaeru no wo shinjite
kaerimichi no kousaten de koe wo kaketekureta ne
I will never forget the hopes and dreams we shared during that one summer's end.
I am sure we will meet again in another August, in maybe ten years time.
But those are my best memories.
We met in an unexpected moment
when you called out to me at the crosswalk,
ureshikute tanoshikute bouken mo iro iro shita ne
futari no himitsu no kichi no naka
kimi to natsu no owari shourai no yume ookina kibou wasurenai
jyuunen no ato hachigatsu mata deaeru no wo shinjite
kimi ga saigo made kokoro kara arigatou sakendeita koto shitetayo
We shared so many happy times and thrilling adventures
I will never forget the hopes and dreams we shared during that one summer's end.
I am sure we will meet again in another August, in maybe ten years time.
I could feel your heartfelt thanks all the way until the end.
And I know it must have been painful
to hold back your tears and say goodbye with a smile.
But those are my best memories.
